main event: A civilian witness reported seeing a white, glowing UFO that swayed slowly and moved eastward at an estimated speed of 700 mph in Ridgefield, Connecticut in 1962.
interesting points: The UFO had a deep blue-green light around it that was more intense near the center.
The UFO remained stationary for about 10 minutes before gradually disappearing.
The witness could hear a low, steady hum coming from the UFO.
The UFO's shape was long and it moved away very quickly.
The sighting was corroborated by both visual and radar tracking.
sighted object: a white, glowing UFO with a deep blue-green light
